column4: DOES ANYONE KNOW WHAT THIS ERROR MEANS!?     unable to stat './usr/share/man/man8' (which I was about to install)
it means there's no ./usr/share/man/man8
how do i fix this man8 error?
what exactly are you doing to get it?
I am trying to upate but can't...I am trying to install packages but can't nothing works...
this is not "exactly"
whenever I try to install software it happens..
so pick a particular example and pastebin your command and full output
basically when I run "aptitude update" or aptitude install *insert app name here*
so pick a particular example and pastebin your command and full output
what is the URL to pastebin?
paste.ubuntu.com
ok just give me a sec and I'll have a copy of the error..
HERE"S THE PASTEBIN!     http://paste.ubuntu.com/494430/
check dmesg for interesting things
ok I did... a big long list of the same error over and over..
we can't see what you see

you need to run fsck.  I must leave now however
